reason_tldr: Crappy support, few updates, lack of trustworthiness, reliability, Android Keystore crypto fragility (causes bank, social media, emails apps to crash, sign you out), no VoLTE
Virus from 3rd party ink, Disabling 3rd party ink if InstantInk subscription was used once, need ink for scanning feature (when you’re not even printing, only scanning)
Disables scanner when you run out of ink, Ink DRM which also backfired due to chip shortage
